name: cleaning_pause
description: This function is used to pause the robot vacuum cleaner during its cleaning cycle.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located. e.g. home, office, etc.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.  e.g. living room, bedroom, bathroom, etc.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name of the device to be paused.
